titles.title: Providing for further consideration of the bill (H.R. 3219) making appropriations for the Department of Defense for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2018, and for other purposes, and providing for consideration of motions to suspend the rules.

Providing for further consideration of the bill (H.R. 3219) making appropriations for the Department of Defense for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2018, and for other purposes, and providing for consideration of motions to suspend the rules.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 115-261, by Mr. Newhouse.

The resolution provides for further consideration of H.R. 3219, under a structured rule. The resolution makes in order only those further amendments printed in Part B of the report. Also the resolution provides that it shall be in order at any time on the legislative day of July 27, 2017, or July 28, 2017, for the Speaker to entertain motions to suspend the rules.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 69.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 478.
DEBATE - The House resumed debate on H. Res. 478.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 233 - 185 (Roll no. 426).

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by recorded vote: 230 - 196 (Roll no. 427).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.)
Sets forth the rule for consideration of H.R. 3219 (Department of Defense Appropriations Act, 2018).
